RON.raw_line: Did ya hear Rock Hudson was a cock sucker?It's called a newspaper. You heard of it?What a waste. All that fine Hollywood pussy on a guy who smokes his friends.C'mon Rog, this ain't the sandbox. Twenty's the minimum.Calm the nerves, brother. You look great.It's your day, I can feel it.Eight seconds and you'll be gettin blown by a hundred dollar hooker before you can scrape the bullshit off your boots.C'mon! One one thousand, two one thousand, three one thousand... Dallas Buyers Club / Green Revision / Dec 2, 2012 / P. 3Ah hen shit!Hey, buddy I need you to arrest me.Come on, man. I'm serious!You gonna cuff me or what?Gotta die from somethin'.You're startin' to sound like your ol' man. How's he doin' by the way?Ah, he's a tough one. Though I can't imagine how disappointed he must be havin' you for a son.You rattled my fuckin' brain.That shit is purer than a preacher daughter's pussy.What do you wanna go work for a buncha sand niggas for?They got hot ladies over there?Now that takes me out right there.Dumb spic. How'd you get your leg in there?Where's the ambulance?Go call `em. Go FUCKING call `em.Alright we're going to get you outta there but you gotta stay still until I say get the fuck out and then you get the fuck out. Comprende? Dallas Buyers Club / Green Revision / Dec 2, 2012 / P. 7Alright, on the count of three. One, two...What kinda blood tests, cause I don't use drugs.Good, cause that ain't none of yer business anyway.Who you kidding, Rock cock sucking Hudson bullshit?!Homo? Homo? That's what you said, right? Shit. You gotta be kidding me. I ain't no faggot, I don't even know any faggots, I'm a rodeo!Look at me, doc. Come on now, look at me. What do you see?What the fuck's a three-Cell?!Well surprise this: you've made a fuckin' mistake!You must've mixed my blood with some daisy puller or sumptin.Thirty days?What is this shit?!I got a news flash for all y'all, there ain't nothin' out there that can kill Ron Woodroof in thirty days.Shit, you tell `em you got a cold and they'll give you two weeks off. You should try it.I mean I got a stupid cough and they tell me I got some HIV virus.Hell, like I got the AIDS. Damn hospital, mixed up my blood samples.S'what I'm saying.Which is exactly why it's a mistake.You know me, T. You fuckin' serious?I'll catch up with you.I'm cool.Do I look like I can wait til tomorrow?Problem? Which problem you want to hear about? My lungs bleeding, my skin crawling, the jackhammer in my head... hell that's just the beginning of my problems sweetheart.I don't want no nurse. I want a doctor. A goddamn doctor! Today! NOW!Are you fuckin' deaf, lady? Dallas Buyers Club / Green Revision / Dec 2, 2012 / P. 15Twenty minutes? I like your style, Doctor.Can you get me AZT?Barrow Wilkem just released it for testing, right? This hospital is one of the sites.Well can I buy some?You give dyin' people sugar pills?Can you get it for me?So, you're tellin' me I'm as good as a horse being sold for dog food?Okay, what about in Germany, this Dextran Sulfate, or in France they got DDC, or AL 721 in Israel... I read that one is proven to work and it ain't toxic.Screw the FDA, I'm gonna be DOA. Do I have to sue this hospital to get me some medicine?Call me Ron, will ya?I'm dying and you're tellin' me to go get a hug from a bunch of faggots?Good night, good day, and good riddance.Neddie Jay, one shot of Cactus and a Rolling Rock back.I can't believe how much I missed your ugly faces. Clint, where you hangin' your pants lately brother?`Fuck you say?You askin' me to kick yer ass?Where you goin', bud? I thought you're my friend.Fuck all ya'll.Tooth fairy, if we weren't in a public place right now, your teeth would be so far down your throat you'd be usin' your ass to chew food.I need to slow it down a second, catch my breath. I'm not ready to crawl into a corner. You hear that? I'm not fucking ready. Man, if you're up there you better be listening. Dallas Buyers Club / Green Revision / Dec 2, 2012 / P. 19AAnd if there's a chance, if I got one fucking chance, send me a sign. Dallas Buyers Club / Green Revision / Dec 2, 2012 / P. 20I'll take a dance, but not fer me. Just shake it, he'll see you.Thanks.The hell you doin' here?Fuck you doin' in my house?I got more cash.What the hell is this bullshit? Dallas Buyers Club / Green Revision / Dec 2, 2012 / P. 23Beautiful.I'm sure that didn't surprise anyone.Was that a smile?Who said I was on AZT?Wait. We were just gettin' somewhere.Congratulations, fuck you and go back to your bed.Get the fuck outta here, whatever you are.You got cash?I'da figured you for queens.Jesus Christ, I'm straight, OK!Why the fuck you in here anyway?How much is he paying you?What?How about me? Will you sell me some?I signed myself out.The worst-case scenario bein' what?Thanks, but I prefer to die with my boots on.Well as my doctor, can you get me some damn AZT?I still live here, you hear me?! I fuckin' live here!! Dallas Buyers Club / Green Revision / Dec 2, 2012 / P. 27Have fun, kids. It's all yours.I'm lookin' for Dr. Vass.I'm lookin' for Vass, for some AZT.Doc, this place is a shit-hole.Why? What'd you do?So cocaine gave me pneumonia?I thought AZT's supposed to help me.So medically speakin', I kicked my own ass! Dallas Buyers Club / Green Revision / Dec 2, 2012 / P. 30Well?Am I still positive for HIV?If it sucks, I got it.And you can't buy them back in the U.S.?Chinks, homos and herbs, you got a new world order here, Vass. You could be makin' a fortune off this stuff.Nada.Well as I told the gentlemen, I am a sick man. I have cancer. I take 22 pills a day and these here vials of Vitamin A, C, E and Zinc. That there is ninety days.Well, as I said, they're not for sale. And they ain't illegal, just "unapproved."Then I promise to take each and every one of them pills myself. In fact this present detainment has already put me off schedule... Son.I'm looking for Dr. Eve Saks.Dead? Sorry for bargin' in.Actually I look amazin'. But you, you look like shit.So you got any music? Or crackers?It's a celebration of how absolutely fuckin' wrong you were.Thirty days you said! Well here it is months later and I'm goin' like gangbusters. Now if that don't call for a little Cheez Whiz on a Ritz, I don't know what does!You women love Nancy Boys.Hell, I'll tell you what's wrong, it's the goddamn AZT!It's killin' him, can't you see that? Why you think I look so healthy?Tinkerbell, how much cash you got?Helpin' him, that's what.So they can fuck him up even worse?Relax, it's just a little vitamin boost, A, C, zinc. Dallas Buyers Club / Green Revision / Dec 2, 2012 / P. 36You want to live, get off the AZT.Yeah, real lucky. I've got stuff here that works. Healthy, non-toxic. You should trial it and we'll both get rich.Tell your friends about me. Send `em my way and I'll hook `em up.And tell `em to bring their fuckin' money. Cash. No checks.Are you out of your fucking mind?!Jesus Mother Mary Fuckin' Christ!I could of killed you!Good for you. Now get the fuck out!Listen Tinkerbell, unless you got cash or some new clients for me, I'm busy. Now get the f...Am I fuckin' dreamin'?Here's enough for 20, find me 20 more and I'll cut you in. Five percent.What's wrong?Ten.Five grand worth of shit. Shit I owe money on.I was just sharing.Yeah, I understand.No, perfect place. We gotta lay low. Don't wanna get busted. I got a plan. Dallas Buyers Club / Green Revision / Dec 2, 2012 / P. 41Do not use the word "we". Now you wanna put your apron on and fly around on your broom, be my guest.Howdy Counselor, welcome.He's my partner. Business partner.Your office's next door.Don't worry, Counselor. I ain't selling drugs anymore. I'm giving them away. For free. By selling memberships. Four hundred a month in dues gets you all the meds you need. Dallas Buyers Club / Green Revision / Dec 2, 2012 / P. 42Bitches. Plural. There's a bunch of faggots runnin' a hell of a club up in New York. That's where I got the idea. Welcome to the Dallas Buyers Club.Bring 'em in and if you call me Roanie again... ...I'ma use this gun to give you the sex change you been hopin' for.Ah shit, did I scare you? Sorry. Welcome to the Dallas Buyers Club.He told you how it works? Treatments and drugs are free, but the membership, 400$.You'll have to sign a waiver. We take no responsibility for the drugs we give you. You croak, you croak. That's your problem.First of all, flush that shit down the toilet. Secondly, stay away from anything that'll cook your insides. Third, get healthy and if your brain's broke, I got something called Peptide T that'll fix it. Dallas Buyers Club / Green Revision / Dec 2, 2012 / P. 44Fill that there out and don't cheat on the drugs part. Can't help you if I don't know what you're doin'.I got more stuff comin' in about a week. Til then, watch what you eat and who you eat.Never mind. I'll call back. Thank you. Arigato.I live here. Dallas Buyers Club / Green Revision / Dec 2, 2012 / P. 45Not exactly. What are you doing here?They're treatin' themselves.Vitamins, Peptide T, DDC. Anything but that poison you're hawkin'.Do you ever wear any color? Every time I see you I see white.Why? You wanna go grab a steak? I know it's red but...This is the shit that'll rot your insides. What a surprise, FDA approved. What the fuck is potassium benzoate?You fuckin' kiddin' me?Don't pollute me with that processed crap. I'm eatin' healthy.Put it back.Fine. Dallas Buyers Club / Green Revision / Dec 2, 2012 / P. 47This is Rayon. He said hi to you.Shake his hand, T.J.Come on, buddy, what's your fuckin' problem?Good. Now get the fuck outta here and go back to your miserable life.What?Fifty bucks. You don't got the money, you don't join the club. This ain't no charity.You need three hundred and fifty more.I'm usin' it for memory loss. You oughta try gettin' it to market.Damn, bureaucracy is good business.And these are for your daughter.Jesus! Are you fuckin' high?Actually, it is if I can't fuckin' trust you. Denise!You're in charge!Make sure my new Caddy is at the airport for when I get back.Denise, you hearin' this? Now you two monkeys take care of the zoo.Keep an eye on him.That's me.What do you mean?Fourteen hours on a plane, but hey, who gives a shit, right? Dallas Buyers Club / Green Revision / Dec 2, 2012 / P. 51Look, if it's a matter of money, I can make it worth your while, I got cash--Yeah, I'm coming. Prepare the sedation. Propofol. 10 milligrams. Dallas Buyers Club / Green Revision / Dec 2, 2012 / P. 52I said I'm coming. Good morning.That a party out there?Doc-tor Sevard! You must be surprised to see me.And I need to know what you're pumpin' into me here.What? Get it out!I'm gonna sue you for attempted murder! Where's my stuff?Go to hell. I say what goes in my body, not you. Final. Period. End of story.This thing's an epidemic and you're still lookin for guinea pigs. Well do I look like a rodent to you?That's right. I fooled you. You told me I'd be dead in thirty days. Dallas Buyers Club / Green Revision / Dec 2, 2012 / P. 54Well HOWDYFUCKINDOODY, cuz it's a year later and look whose still here?Now I'm through with you. You got anything to say, tell it to my real doctor, Dr. Saks.Where's my suitcase?Nope. And if you're gonna call an orderly on me, you'd better fuckin' do it, cuz this motherfucker is going home.Then tell him to move to the fuckin' sunshine state!What do you mean you can't get it back?! It was authorized by a doctor!Then check China, Amsterdam and Israel cause that's where I'm fuckin' goin'!I got first hand experience with all of 'em. And I'll tell you something else, if I don't know what somethin' is, or don't trust the white coat who's trying to sell it to me, I fed-ex it to my lab in Seattle and they test if for me.Then I test it all on myself before I give it to anyone else. I'm my own lab rat.Compound Q. You know what happens if I come off it? My hair falls out, I lose weight, I can't get my dick up and I start to die. I got three hundred other people with the same experience. Peptitde T. Gets rid of dementia. Stop takin' it and you can't think straight, walk straight, or act straight. I got over two hundred people on that. You following me? DDC and DDI, both toxic, but in small doses, helps kick opportunistic infections.All the hospital wants is to serve up AZT.Fuck the virus, once you got that, you're married to it. I'm more concerned about my symptoms and survival. I mean, I'm no scientist but...You fuckin' high again?Are you listenin' to what I'm sayin' here about usin' that shit? And what the fuck did you do to my wall?!People can live with this thing for longer than they're saying. Ninety-six- percent of people diagnosed with AIDS in the U S of A will be dead in under six months.Then use them. Why give people AZT when their immune system is broken? It's fuckin' toxic!Maybe I did abuse it, but I'm off it now, and I'm here, feeling good. And I'm not the only one.Why is Boy George's goddamned face everywhere in my room?Take your sunflower and get out.You know what, look at it, don't look at it, I don't give a shit.Don't touch!If you ain't doin' poppers and coke, how come you look like such shit?You pussy, stick it in. Who do you think is gonna do that when I ain't here?Rayon, I swear, God sure was dressin' the wrong doll when he blessed you with a pair of balls. Give me that thing.You know it's one thing for me not to like you, but why don't you be a better friend to yourself?What are you doin' here?Nice work, fellas, great. This is how you got Al Capone, ain't it?A fine? Fine, alright, how much? Ten thousand? Twenty thousand? I'll write you a check right now.You think that will stop me, you motherfuckers!Rayon, I don't need help gettin' ladies from your sorry ass.It's the Wildflowers. Texas style.Thanks for coming.The IRS is on my ass. I wonder who tipped them off? Dallas Buyers Club / Green Revision / Dec 2, 2012 / P. 63Nah. But you gonna have to watch what you say when you're around that snake you work with. He's the virus I'm worried about. As a matter fact, if you hear of anything...Bring us your best bottle of Cabernet.Nice restaurant, beautiful woman. I feel like a human being again. How come you ain't got no high powered corporate honey to take you dancin'?That's cause you don't got a honey. How old are you anyway? Twenty two?To eat, drink, enjoy life, be merry...Take a break, relax, breathe, Saks.Normal people do that, ya know.So why'd you become a doctor?Not what I thought you'd say but makes sense, your dad was a practical man.Well my old man was an electrician. A good one too. But he was a better drinker. Which I learned from him as well.So I was around it a lot. Got pretty good at takin' shit apart, seein' how the insides worked, and then puttin' it back together. I was good at it and it put some change in my pocket.She was a painter, kind of a gypsy. She got tired a' all the shit and left. You know how it is.Don't feel like you gotta hang it. I know you like everything perfect.You need to enjoy your life, little lady. You only got one.I'm gonna kill him!We're running low on DDC and Peptide-T, I thought you were stocking this?Scientifically controlled, my ass! They took eight months to approve it. And from what we know now, AZT is everything but safe!That's four pills, three times a day with food. The vitamins too.The hell's all this?In other words, my entire inventory.Aloe vera! It's a plant. What do you give a shit if people eat plants?It's a bullshit technicality and you know it! Get my lawyer on the phone.Illegal? Unapproved! These are vitamins and minerals, for Chrissake!I'm not selling that stuff, you confiscated it, remember? Dallas Buyers Club / Green Revision / Dec 2, 2012 / P. 68What's the matter, you got Alzheimer, Richard? 'Cause Peptide T works for Alzheimers too, ya know?Come on, it's a protein! Effective with dementia which I have. Why don't you just look at my research?Don't threaten me! I'm unapproved motherfucker! The process? That's just FDA bullshit for pay up! 250 million worth!These fuckers are comin' at me from all angles! I wanna file a restraining order!The Government and their fuckin' FDA!We gotta relocate!It means we were unapproved. Now we're illegal!Let's get outta here.Send a round of beers over to my friends.You ain't gettin' tits, Rayon. Memberships are high and so is demand. So we recruit more members from where?Yep! I'm gotta find MDs to write them prescriptions so we can keep dealin' these drugs... legally now.Oh yeah, Bonnie and Clyde comin' in for a loan. Stop starin' at her tits, you're startin' to look normal.Tuck, sorry to hear about your dad's Alzheimer. This will help. Woodroof.This place is crap, I'll give you one fifty a month and fifty percent off your meds.Don't try to con me --What do you want?Oh. Well that's good news.Hello... Howdy...I got what you got and I have traveled the world looking for alternative medications, stuff not available yet in America, thanks to the good folks down at the FDA.Some of you may have heard of the Dallas Buyers Club, an organization I founded with my friend Rayon. Risk might be high, but what the hell, you're risking your life every time you go into one of them there hospitals. I don't know where most of the people are who were at these meetings a year and a half ago... maybe they lost interest... maybe they're dead... but I'm here. I'm walking, talking, breathing... and ain't no one gonna take that away from me. I gotta life to lead.HIV don't mean shit. You ain't sick, you ain't sick. Period. You tell a guy he's got a week to live? Shit, he's already dead. You tell a guy he can keep on goin'? He'll find a way. Remember, ya ain't dyin'. But if you think you are then you ain't got nothing to lose.What? No, please, wait a minute, doc... Dallas Buyers Club / Green Revision / Dec 2, 2012 / P. 75All the MDs are fuckin' backpeddlin' on their heels. The FDA is scaring them with license revocation if they write scripts.Where'd you get that?Did you sell your ass?Really, come on, where did you get it?Goin' to Mexico, chica, you comin'?Come on, tequila, sunshine, tacos, never hurt anybody.I knew you'd rain on my party, but I had to give it a shot. Listen, I gotta ask you a favor. I need you to write me prescriptions so I can come across the border. I might not need it but if I do, I'll have them.You know this rule that the FDA just passed was just bullshit. Ain't no doc from here to the north pole will write them.Okay! Never hurts to ask.Keep it, nurse Ratched!Doesn't surprise me at all.The anti-fungal, right? I read about this.As much I can carry.Hell Vass, I'm just tryin' to run a business.Yes sir.No shit? Well how's that for a coincidence?You said it.Can you prove they're not?Where's Rayon?Sevaaaaard!Sevard!There you are, you son of a bitch.You killed him.You call yourself a doctor? You are a murderer.Arrest me? Did you hear that?First class everything, big house, Mercedes Benz. That's what they pay him to say it's OK to pump poison into y'all.Get away from me. I got AIDS. I'll spit on you.You see this? This is harassment. Get me my attorney or do I have to be my own lawyer too. Own doctor, own lawyer.Hook `em up.Sell my car and make sure everyone gets what they need.Just dance.Anemia, Cancer, Bone Marrow depletion, Fever, Diarrhea, Vomiting, Neuropathy, Anxiety, Dizziness, Impotence, Hearing loss, Nervousness, Seizures... Sound like AIDS to you? That there comes inside a box of AZT, a list of side effects.... and got carried out in a trash bag three days later!Let me ask you something. Let's say I have the cure right here in my back pocket. I could save everyone today.But I don't have no funding and I don't have no backing. Now how long is it gonna take before the FDA approves it?Read that and you tell me how wrong is too wrong?I got three thousand people who need to get their hands on Peptide T. Now. Including me.If I don't get it by the end of the week I wanna file a lawsuit.Well find a place where it's not, Goddamnit. Go to San Francisco, get a sissy judge, figure it out!Perfect.Here you go, please read this.I'm givin' people information... on this trial I'm in, right now. I want everyone here to know what's going on.Why was Peptide T cut off? A non-toxic drug, that I have proof works and that according to the National Institute of Mental Health, is completely safe.I'm a drug dealer? You're the drug dealer. The pharmaceutical companies are the drug dealers.The yellow number fives, red, green and purple dye you put in this here candy causes seven kinds a cancer.The aspartame in my diet coke, the steroids in my meat, the hormones in my milk, the antibiotics in the chicken. Now that's the shit the FDA knows will kill you. Yet you're all up there worried that some sick people will find somethin' without you and y'all won't get paid.Oh I'm bad, I'm nationwide!One left.That was a ballsy move!A nice, warm hug... ...and a day of watchin' some bull ridin', that's what you need, doctor Woodroof's order.Don't you miss a regular life?Yeah, I guess. I just want...... an ice-cold beer at Ruby's. Go dancin' with my woman. I want kids... thumb wrestle with my sons. I don't know. I got one life -- mine. But I want someone else's. I feel I'm fighting for a life I ain't got the time to live.I want it all to mean somethin'.I still am!I'm glad you're doin' better, sir.Thanks for the tip, Tuck.I ain't no cop. Why'nt you tell 'em?It's the bust of the century! Don't they look like hardened criminals?! Dallas Buyers Club / Green Revision / Dec 2, 2012 / P. 92Deadly drugs? What the fuck?I can't believe it. I tipped those assholes off.They'll never break me.Jesus Mother Mary Fucking Christ!

EVE.raw_line: In 64, when AZT was developed for cancer treatment, it was shelved due to lack of anti cancer efficacy and toxicity. Dallas Buyers Club / Green Revision / Dec 2, 2012 / P. 8So you're conducting another animal study?How long do you see the study going on?Does it not drive you just a little bit crazy when these guys stand up there talking about curing the sick while they're flashing gold Rolexes? What do they know about sick patients?Blood tests.We didn't test you for drugs.We ran the blood test several times.That's some information on HIV and AIDS you may find informative and your test results.Mr. Woodroof?Fine. How can I help you?No. I'm a fucking doctor!If you want to discuss your list of problems, you can meet me in my office in twenty minutes.That isn't how it works. For about a year, a group of patients will either get the drug or a placebo, it's left up to chance, not even the doctors are allowed to know.It's the only way to know if a drug works. Dallas Buyers Club / Green Revision / Dec 2, 2012 / P. 16Unfortunately no. But when it's proven to work and if you fit the profile, then yes.None of those drugs have been approved by the FDA.Mr. Woodroof, I assure you that would be a waste of precious time.There is a support group that meets every day at Draddy Auditorium, perhaps you could share your feelings and concerns...You missed your last trial appointment. Dallas Buyers Club / Green Revision / Dec 2, 2012 / P. 22Rayon, the whole point of this study is to determine whether AZT is helping people.That doesn't mean I'm going to stop trying.You're in the hospital.You almost died.Get some rest.Mr. Woodroof!Where are you going?You're too sick to leave here.We can keep you comfortable at least.As your doctor, I cannot recommend you to do this.It's open!Mr. Woodroof... Ron, I thought you were... Dallas Buyers Club / Green Revision / Dec 2, 2012 / P. 34What are you doing here? You look great.What happened to you?I'm sorry, but what is this?Excuse me?No. Don't... I don't really eat here.Tell me what's wrong.What?What the hell do you think you're doing?!He's a participant in a clinical trial, we need to get him to the hospital!Are you out of your mind?! If anything happens to him--It's a blind study! We don't even know if he's getting AZT!Leave, please!This man also had a transfusion?He's actually getting worse.What do you mean?Really?Transfusions always makes patients feel better. Give the placebo patients new blood and they'll feel better too.I have questions about the drug's safety. I've seen it drop white blood cells in a lot of my patients making them more susceptible to infection.After six months?But we have no idea what the long term effects are. It's irresponsible.Can I see a copy of the study?A press release from the NIH?He didn't call, leave a message?What are you doing here?Where's Rayon? You're roommates now?Roger Thompson? This is my patient. Are you treating these people?With what?Tell Rayon I was looking for him. And I'm telling my patients to stay away from here.He came in once for advice. I have no idea what he does outside of this hospital.Actually, I've been reading about Buyers Clubs. They say they found other drugs that are eliminating symptoms. Dallas Buyers Club / Green Revision / Dec 2, 2012 / P. 55-57Ron, I respect that you're learning about your illness but some of these people should be in the hospital.AZT helps eradicate the virus. Dallas Buyers Club / Green Revision / Dec 2, 2012 / P. 58AI know the statistics.If you're abusing it, like you did, with no medical surveillance, of course it is. Dallas Buyers Club / Green Revision / Dec 2, 2012 / P. 58BThey're beautiful. Thank you. And I don't even have to water them.You don't actually believe I would do that?I don't dance.Why are we here?Yeah right.Because I was good in science. And my father said studying history was a waste of time. So I went to med school.Yes, he was. Your turn. Why did you become... an electrician, right?What about your mom? Dallas Buyers Club / Green Revision / Dec 2, 2012 / P. 64AShe painted that, your mom?I do not. I'll hang it. I'm going to hang it. It's just... are you sure you don't want to keep it?I want all my HIV patients on the asymptomatic study to have their AZT doses lowered to the minimum, 600 milligrams.I don't need permission. I'm their doctor.I'm not doing a study for people who are asymptomatic with a toxic drug that makes them sick. We don't treat people who have antibodies for pneumonia or chicken pox when they're healthy. Why should HIV be any different?Says who? Barrow Wilkem?!Besides, I consulted with each of them individually, it was their decision.What are you doing? Dallas Buyers Club / Green Revision / Dec 2, 2012 / P. 76Do I look like someone who takes vacations?I know and I can't either. I'm sorry. We can't write scripts for random people and random drugs. Plus what if something goes wrong with these drugs? We could get sued, lose our license.Good. I'll be in my office. Thanks for calling. Dallas Buyers Club / Green Revision / Dec 2, 2012 / P. 79Rayon was a drug addict! It wasn't a day on AZT that killed him, but the disease as a whole!Ron, you stole my prescription pad! So don't accuse me of acting irresponsibly! Rayon came to the hospital on his own... Dallas Buyers Club / Green Revision / Dec 2, 2012 / P. 83AHe was my friend too, you know!What's going on?What? This is crazy! All these kids are HIV positive?Would you give this fifth of a dose to your own child?I won't. You'll have to fire me.Y'all go fuck yourselves!We're splitting that.Regular? What's that? Doesn't exist.What?It does. Dallas Buyers Club / Green Revision / Dec 2, 2012 / P. 89This is Fluconazole. It helps them with Thrush.
